title: Centred camera change.
body:
https://i.gyazo.com/3774a62f991487d0d8f35e4b4591c077.png

Like come on guys, please.
It's the little things...

https://i.gyazo.com/d355e5080757ee7bf7a239035ae6f44b.png

No blue essence on first win of the day, no centred camera, are the patch notes actually just words?
I love this game, but it's really starting to drive me up the wall.

replies.body:
If I could, I would just revert LoL back to season 2 right now.

Oldskool? I still play D2 (2001) with mods (2012).

I remember the days where you could be hit by Morgana's Q and you could still make it out alive in a fight if you played right.
Now even the slightest CC is an absolute death sentence.

If it wasn't for the absence of Azir/Sol/Taliyah, season 2 would sound pretty inviting.
yeah and you're still called "trash" for dying.

See, although I only play ARAM, I main tank.

Tanking a teamfight is near impossible now, the shitty new rune system is all damage and no defense.

I can build full armour (and health) against a 5 AD team, as Galio, and still get shredded like paper.

Fuck this glass cannon edition of LoL, make me want to play more than one game a day.
Is this TRULY the downfall of League of Legends?

But in all honesty, my confidence in league is shaken.
This year has been rife with very poor decisions, ones they wont even admit to despite nearly the whole community turning on them.

League is already less fun, theres wayyy too much damage across the whole board, I get 1-hit by tanks now, and assassins somehow manage to 1-hit two or tree people at once. Mages can deal half your health with a single ability + runes. and I genuinely have no idea how to even begin to take on fighters like Xin or Nasus seeming you cant exactly kite them anymore.

Winning feels so much less satisfying when all you get is XP towards level-ups that don't actually mean anything. And when you finally do get the elusive blue essence, you cant even get champs because you have to spend it all on levelling up your lvl 7's...

If they don't get their act together, they may well start losing players.

_But its all worth though, cos emotes.._

>But its all worth though, cos emotes..

Cos an allowed way to flame other players.
That costs pretty much the same as a ward.. lets not forget.
Flaming your team, as natural as warding.

I thought they would be pumpimg money into the game to ensure they make it a consistently smooth flowing game with minimal bugs. I wonder what percent of profits go into the game maintenance/developmemt vs lining their pockets. Id say 70/30 in favour of pocket lining.

as in way less goes back into the game
